biotools.summary: The Exon Array Analyzer (EAA) allow to process CEL files from Affymetrix, Inc. GeneChip® Exon 1.0 ST Arrays. Various processign steps and visualizations are implemented to identify alternative splicing events. Three simple steps have to be performed to submit a set of CEL files. After the processing is completed the results can be viewed in the browser.
